segments.text: I see the woman is so focused on drying that plate, she seems happy.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She hasn't even noticed the water overflowing from the sink, it's surprising.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her foot is in the water, but she doesn't seem to care, she's so focused.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The children are being so sneaky, taking cookies without her knowing, it's a bit funny.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is standing on a stool, reaching for the cookie jar, he looks determined.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope he doesn't fall and hurt himself, that would be bad.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is waiting for her cookie, her hand outstretched, she looks excited.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't believe the woman hasn't noticed any of this, it's amazing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden outside looks so calm and tidy, it's lovely.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think someone should really step in and help before something bad happens, but it's interesting to watch.
segments.speaker: PAR
